question: Supply refers to the quantity supplied at a particular price for a particular period of time
Increase or decrease in supply means

answers.a: change in supply due to change in factors other than its own price

question: A producer’s positively sloped supply curve for a commodity represents

answers.a: a maximum boundary of the producer’s intentions
answers.b: a minimum boundary of the producer’s intentions
answers.c: in one sense a maximum and in another sense a minimum boundary of the producer’s intentions

question: Expansion in supply means that the producers are willing to supply a

answers.a: larger quantity of the commodity at an increased price
answers.b: larger quantity of the commodity due to increased taxation on that commodity
answers.c: larger quantity of the commodity at the same price
answers.d: larger quantity of the commodity at a decreased price

question: Which of the following will NOT shift the market supply curve of good X?

answers.a: A change in the cost of inputs used to produce good X
answers.b: A change in the technology used to produce X
answers.c: A change number of sellers of good X
answers.d: A change in the price of good X
